casebody.data:
The PEOPLE etc., Respondent,
v.
Omar DELEON, Appellant. 2018-726 Court of Appeals of New York. August 30, 2018

***932Motion for assignment of counsel granted and Justine M. Luongo, Esq., Attorney-in-Chief, Criminal Defense Practice, The Legal Aid Society, 199 Water Street, New York, NY 10038 assigned as counsel to the appellant on the appeal herein.
